mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_CODE , CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_NO , USE_FLAG FROM TB_CATEGORY ORDER BY CATEGORY_NO ASC
SELECT SECTION_CODE , BUILDING_CODE , PLACE_CODE , CATEGORY_CODE FROM TB_EVENT WHERE DATE_FORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() ORDER BY EVENT_START_TIME LIMIT 1

SELECT A.EVENT_NAME , A.PLACE_CODE , ( SELECT PLACE_NAME FROM TB_PLACE P WHERE A.SECTION_CODE = P.SECTION_CODE AND A.BUILDING_CODE = P.BUILDING_CODE AND A.PLACE_CODE = P.PLACE_CODE ) AS PLACE_NAME , EVENT_TYPE_CODE , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%T') AS EVENT_START_TIME , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_END_TIME, '%T') AS EVENT_END_TIME , CONCAT(DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%T'), '~', DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_END_TIME, '%T')) AS EVENT_TIME , ( SELECT COUNT(USER_CODE) AS TOT_USER_CNT FROM TB_EVENT_USER_MAPP_GROUP G WHERE A.EVENT_CODE = G.EVENT_CODE GROUP BY G.EVENT_CODE ) AS TOT_PRSNNL , MINIMUM_PRSNNL , MAXIMUM_PRSNNL , DETAIL_INFO FROM TB_EVENT A WHERE A.SECTION_CODE = #{sectionCode} AND (A.EVENT_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTSTS001' OR A.EVENT_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTSTS001')

SELECT A.EVENT_NAME , A.PLACE_CODE , ( SELECT PLACE_NAME FROM TB_PLACE P WHERE A.SECTION_CODE = P.SECTION_CODE AND A.BUILDING_CODE = P.BUILDING_CODE AND A.PLACE_CODE = P.PLACE_CODE ) AS PLACE_NAME , EVENT_TYPE_CODE , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%T') AS EVENT_START_TIME , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_END_TIME, '%T') AS EVENT_END_TIME , CONCAT(DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%T'), '~', DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_END_TIME, '%T')) AS EVENT_TIME , ( SELECT COUNT(USER_CODE) AS TOT_USER_CNT FROM TB_EVENT_USER_MAPP_GROUP G WHERE A.EVENT_CODE = G.EVENT_CODE GROUP BY A.EVENT_CODE ) AS TOT_PRSNNL , A.MINIMUM_PRSNNL , A.MAXIMUM_PRSNNL , A.DETAIL_INFO FROM TB_EVENT A INNER JOIN TB_EVENT_USER_MAPP_GROUP B ON A.EVENT_CODE = B.EVENT_CODE WHERE B.USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND (A.EVENT_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTSTS001' OR A.EVENT_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTSTS001') AND DATE_FORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, "%Y-%m-%d") >= CURDATE() AND B.LIKE_FLAG = 'Y'
